name: Grimmlet
damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, petrified, poisoned, prone, stunned
languages: understands Void Speech but can’t speak

actions.name: Crystal Edge
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) psychic damage.

special_abilities.name: Reproduce
special_abilities.desc: When a grimmlet takes damage from a spell and isn’t reduced to 0 hp, a number of new grimmlets equal to the spell’s level appear in unoccupied spaces within 10 feet of the grimmlet. If the spell is a cantrip, only one grimmlet is created. Sixteen or more grimmlets within 30 feet of each other can use their reactions to come together and form a grimmlet swarm in a space within 5 feet of one grimmlet.

special_abilities.name: Self-destruct
special_abilities.desc: When the grimmlet dies, it explodes in a spray of Void-infused crystal shards. Each creature within 5 feet of the grimmlet must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or take 3 (1d6) slashing damage and 3 (1d6) psychic damage. Grimmlets damaged by this trait don’t Reproduce.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
special_abilities.desc:
The grimmlet’s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:
At will: crushing curse, minor illusion
3/day each: maddening whispers
